attributes.action: Allow Northern Cyprus to be part of the Pet Passport scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northern Cyprus was part of the pet passport scheme until 2004 and then all of a sudden a decision was reached to deny pets travelling to and from Northern Cyprus the freedom to travel without quarantine. Why, the animals are the only things being punished as it's them who have to spend time in quarantine? So what does this change in policy achieve? Please consider changing this decision?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow Northern Cyprus to be part of the Pet Passport scheme."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21920


Prime Minister's Office
